name: SOLD OUT
description:
In the game "SOLD OUT", you are the owner of a small grocery store with limited start-up capital. You have to use your wisdom to buy goods, stock them up, and then use market volatility to buy low and sell high to earn the maximum profit. And face the evil landlord who came to collect the rent within the agreed time.

"SOLD OUT" is an idle management game, you need to satisfy the customers who come to shop as much as possible. Earn wealth to buy more and better goods.

Business Intelligence

In this game, you need to have sufficient business thinking, fully consider market changes, and draw information and experience from market changes. Think about when to buy, when to sell, when to stockpile, etc.

Placing skills

In this game, it is important to judge market changes, but only by successfully selling products can you truly earn wealth. Only by considering the customer's occupancy, considering the customer's likes and dislikes, and using the customer and product occupancy to maximize the benefits as much as possible, can it be possible to calmly face the rent-collecting landlord. Well, you know the consequences of not being able to pay the rent.
